alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; Oakland; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 10:09AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer, northeastern Oakland, Macomb and St. Clair Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1009 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dryden to Grosse Pointe. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Capac and Armada around 1020 AM EDT. Memphis and Emmett around 1025 AM EDT. Algonac and Harsens Island around 1030 AM EDT. Port Huron and Lakeport around 1040 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Anchorville, North Street, Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Brockway, Utica, Washington, Fort Gratiot and Avoca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
